  • Method Details

    • build

      public GraphicsContext build()

    • apply

      public GraphicsContextBuilder apply(Consumer<GraphicsContext> func)
      Applies a function to the GraphicsContext instance currently being built. Most operations on the instance can be performed using this method.

      Example usage:

      
 apply(graphicsContext -> graphicsContext.setId("Main" + graphicsContext.getTypeSelector()))
      Returns:
      builder instance
